name: DigiMark
tagline: We are DigiMark. We inspire change.
description:
DigiMark is a full-cycle app development agency that does not shy away from solving your mobile challenges. Founded in 2011 after a corporate spin off from JT International Group, DigiMark quickly became one of the leaders in mobile development on the Bulgarian market.
Our company is providing tailor made mobile solutions for our clients and until now we have worked on 100+ projects worldwide. Among our clients are multinational brands as well as startups. We cherish our diversity and we embrace different experiences, hopes and dreams. This connects us more to you!
